StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Get_Person_Comment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT =0 AS
SELECT top 5 Comment , Created_By + ', ' + rtrim(CONVERT(char(120), Created_Date, 120)) + '-' Note_TimeStamp , Created_Date , Created_By , Sequence_No FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID order by Sequence_No desc
